definition: surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means
fence/railing/hurdle/column or box (of text or other data)

sentences.english: Left click, hold, and drag the taskbar up one tier.
sentences.chinese: 点击左键，保持，拖动任务栏到一层之上。

sentences.english: Websites can be “pinned” by dragging them into the taskbar.
sentences.chinese: 可以将站点拖拽到任务栏上将其“钉住”。

sentences.english: Application-defined identifier of the taskbar icon.
sentences.chinese: 任务栏图标的用户定义的标识。

sentences.english: Something else happens in the taskbar that enhances this effect.
sentences.chinese: 任务栏上的其他变化也加强了这一效果。

sentences.english: Icons slightly expand when you hover over them on the taskbar.
sentences.chinese: 当你把鼠标悬停在任务栏图标上时，图标会稍微变大。

sentences.english: The other option is to flash the taskbar icon.
sentences.chinese: 另一种方式是闪动任务栏图标。

pinyin: ping2 mu4 bao3 hu4 cheng2 xu4
